page.title: 04LARKHALL HOUSING
page.content: LARKHALL PRIVATE HOUSING MOST OF THE PRIVATE HOUSES IN LARKHALL ARE SITUATED AROUND MACHANHILL AND CARLISLE ROAD.FROM OUR INVESTIGATION WE DISCOVERED THAT THE SAME NUMBER OF PEOPLE LIVE IN PRIVATE HOUSES AS IN COUNCIL HOUSES.IN GENERAL THESE HOUSES WERE BUILT IN THE 20TH CENTURY,WITH MOST BEING BUILT BETWEEN 1940 AND THE PRESENT DAY.ALTHOUGH MOST WERE BUILT IN IN THE PAST 40 YEARS SOME PRIVATE HOUSES ARE EVEN OLDER MANY OF THESE BUILT IN THE 19TH CENTURY.THE MOST COMMON TYPES OF HOUSES ARE THE VILLA AND BUNGALOW AND IN GENERAL ARE USUALLY SEMI-DETACHED ALTHOUGH THERE ARE SOME LARGE DETACHED HOUSES IN THE TOWN.SOME OF THE HOUSES HAVE PROBLEMS SUCH AS DAMPNESS OR CONDENSATION.THE PRIVATE HOUSES ARE MAINLY HEATED BY GAS WITH ONLY A FEW USING ELECTRICTY ON AVERAGE EACH HOUSE HAS 3 BEDROOMS
